testcase.name: Search Apple Macbook on Amazon
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Amazon login page..........................................passed When User enters username...................................................passed And User enters password....................................................passed And User click on Login button..............................................passed Then User navigates to homepage.............................................passed Given I have a search field on Amazon home page.............................passed When I search with keyword "Apple Macbook Pro"..............................passed Then Product with name "Apple Macbook Pro" should be displayed..............passed
